text:
Zuckerberg sets a running challenge

Facebook CEO Mark Zuckerberg has announced a new challenge for himself and his 47 million followers online. “I am going to run 365 miles [587 km] and I’d love for as many people in this community to join me as possible,” he wrote in a blog post.
title: Run 587 km with Facebook CEO Mark Zuckerberg this year (With Image)
